qa.name: Lily
qa.appearance: Small, with bright eyes and pigtails

json_to_edit.voice_over: In a world where shadows had a life of their own, one became an unlikely guardian.
json_to_edit.description: A living shadow protects a young girl from unseen dangers in her room.
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with moonlight streaming through the window
json_to_edit.name: Shadow Guardian
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A living shadow protects a child from danger in her bedroom.

qa.action: Lily's bedroom bathed in soft moonlight, shadows dancing on the walls.

hf.action: Lily sleeping peacefully in her bed, unaware of the looming danger.

tr.action: A shadow detaches itself from the wall, taking on a protective stance.

xc.action: A dark, menacing shape slowly creeps into the room through the window.

ka.action: Lily stirs in her sleep, sensing the approaching danger.

fn.action: The living shadow expands, positioning itself between Lily and the threat.

af.action: The menacing shape lunges towards Lily's bed, but the shadow intercepts.

qo.action: The shadow engulfs the threat, struggling to contain it away from Lily.

fp.action: Lily's eyes flutter open, but the shadow gently lulls her back to sleep.

va.action: The menacing shape dissipates, leaving the room peaceful once more with the shadow keeping watch.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots, showing the shadow's perspective. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In a world where shadows had a life of their own, one became an unlikely guardian.
updated_json.description: A living shadow protects a young girl from unseen dangers in her room.
updated_json.lighting: Dim, with moonlight streaming through the window
updated_json.name: Shadow Guardian
updated_json.scene_summary: A living shadow protects a child from danger in her bedroom.

qa.action: Lily's bedroom bathed in soft moonlight, shadows dancing on the walls.

hf.action: Lily sleeping peacefully in her bed, unaware of the looming danger.

tr.action: A shadow detaches itself from the wall, taking on a protective stance.

zx.action: From the shadow's perspective, we see the room in shades of gray, with Lily glowing softly in her bed.

xc.action: A dark, menacing shape slowly creeps into the room through the window.

ka.action: Lily stirs in her sleep, sensing the approaching danger.

fn.action: The living shadow expands, positioning itself between Lily and the threat.

wy.action: The shadow's view shows the menacing shape as a dark, pulsating mass of negative energy approaching Lily.

af.action: The menacing shape lunges towards Lily's bed, but the shadow intercepts.

qo.action: The shadow engulfs the threat, struggling to contain it away from Lily.

fp.action: Lily's eyes flutter open, but the shadow gently lulls her back to sleep.

lm.action: From the shadow's view, we see the threat dissolving into harmless wisps of darkness, with Lily's peaceful form becoming clearer.

va.action: The menacing shape dissipates, leaving the room peaceful once more with the shadow keeping watch.

label.rationale: we will add new shots to the scene, showing the shadow's perspective after every three existing shots. this will enhance the narrative by providing a unique viewpoint and add depth to the story. we'll insert these new shots without altering the existing ones, maintaining the original flow while enriching the scene with this new perspective.

value.action: From the shadow's perspective, we see the room in shades of gray, with Lily glowing softly in her bed.
The shadow's view shows the menacing shape as a dark, pulsating mass of negative energy approaching Lily.
From the shadow's view, we see the threat dissolving into harmless wisps of darkness, with Lily's peaceful form becoming clearer.
